name: Cypher
description: Cypher is a first person puzzle game about cryptography.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista (64-bit) or later Processor: 2.8 GHz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
